summary: infective viral etiologies were assessed by real-time multiplex polymerase chain reaction of patients hospitalized with AECOPD and asthma exacerbations. infective etiologies were assessed for association with the clinical outcome of the patients. table S1. Length of hospital stay, readmissions and mortality in relations to types of human rhinovirus identified in the NPA in patients with acute exacerbation of COPD. Figure S2. NPA results of the asthma exacerbation cases in different months.
